title: Active optimal control system of wind and light storage combined power generation system and method

classifications.description: Smart grids as enabling technology in buildings sector
Power conversion systems, e.g. maximum power point trackers
Smart grids as climate change mitigation technology in the energy generation sector

Monitoring or controlling equipment for energy generation units, e.g. distributed energy generation [DER] or load-side generation the energy generation units being or involving renewable energy sources

Systems for electrical power generation, transmission, distribution or end-user application management characterised by the use of communication or information technologies, or communication or information technology specific aspects supporting them characterised by data transport means between the monitoring, controlling or managing units and monitored, controlled or operated electrical equipment using wired telecommunication networks or data transmission busses

abstract: The invention discloses an active power optimization control system and method for a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system. The active power optimization control system includes a wind-wind-storage combined power generation system control center station and a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system control sub-station. According to the planned output curve, the method considers the relevant states of the wind farm, photovoltaic power station and energy storage power station, formulates the output plan of the wind farm, photovoltaic power station and energy storage power station, and sends the relevant plan to each control sub-station; each control sub-station According to the output plan issued by the control center station, the station formulates the corresponding control unit power generation plan, and the control unit finally executes the output plan issued by the control sub-station. Through this control process, it not only ensures that the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system can operate according to the planned output curve, but also reduces the charging and discharging times of the energy storage battery, and at the same time avoids the low-current charging and discharging of the energy storage power station, making full use of the energy storage power station. The short-term overload capability prolongs the service life of the energy storage power station.
abstract_original: 本发明公开了一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统及方法，所述有功优化控制系统包含风光储联合发电系统控制中心站、风光储联合发电系统控制子站。所述方法根据计划出力曲线，考虑风电场、光伏电站和储能电站的相关状态，制定风电场、光伏电站和储能电站出力计划，并将相关计划下发到各控制子站；各控制子站根据控制中心站下发的出力计划，制定相应的控制单元发电计划，控制单元最终执行控制子站下发的出力计划。通过这种控制过程，既保证了风光储联合发电系统能够按照计划出力曲线运行，又能够减少储能电池的充放电次数，同时避免了储能电站的小电流充放电，充分利用了储能电站的短时过载能力，延长了储能电站的使用寿命。
claims:
1. 一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统，其特征是，包括风光储联合发电系统控制中心站、风光储联合发电系统控制子站和风光储联合发电系统控制单元；所述风光储联合发电系统控制子站包括风电场控制子站、光伏发电控制子站和储能控制子站；所述风光储联合发电系统控制单元包括若干个风机控制单元、若干个光伏阵列控制单元和若干个储能电池控制单元；所述风光储联合发电系统控制中心站分别与风电场控制子站、光伏发电控制子站、储能控制子站通过通信光纤实现相互通信；所述风电场控制子站与风机控制单元之间通过通信电缆实现相互通信；所述光伏发电控制子站和光伏阵列控制单元之间通过通信电缆实现相互通信；所述储能控制子站和储能电池控制单元之间通过通信电缆实现相互通信。
		1. An active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system, characterized in that it includes a wind-wind-storage combined power generation system control center station, a wind-wind-storage combined power generation system control sub-station and a wind-wind-storage combined power generation system control unit; The combined power generation system control sub-station includes wind farm control sub-station, photovoltaic power generation control sub-station and energy storage control sub-station; the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system control unit includes several wind turbine control units, several photovoltaic array control units and several An energy storage battery control unit; the wind farm control substation, the photovoltaic power generation control substation, and the energy storage control substation communicate with each other through communication optical fibers; the wind farm control substation communicates with the wind farm control substation The wind turbine control units communicate with each other through communication cables; the photovoltaic power generation control substation and the photovoltaic array control unit communicate with each other through communication cables; the energy storage control substation and the energy storage battery control unit communicate with each other The cables communicate with each other.

2.一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，风光储联合发电系统控制中心站根据计划出力曲线，考虑风电场、光伏电站和储能电站的相关状态，制定风电场、光伏电站和储能电站出力计划，并将相关计划下发到各控制子站；各控制子站根据控制中心站下发的出力计划，制定相应的控制单元发电计划，控制单元最终执行控制子站下发的出力计划。
		2. A control method applied to an active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system, characterized in that the control center station of the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system considers the relevant states of the wind farm, photovoltaic power station and energy storage power station according to the planned output curve , formulate output plans for wind farms, photovoltaic power stations, and energy storage power stations, and distribute the relevant plans to each control substation; each control substation formulates corresponding control unit power generation plans according to the output plan issued by the control center station, and the control unit Finally, implement the output plan issued by the control substation.

4. 如权利要求3所述的一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤一中的风光储联合发电系统控制中心站接收对电网控制指令，实现风功率和光功率预测，监控整个风光储联合发电系统的状态，制定并下发风电场、光伏电站和储能电站的发电计划，接收风电场和光伏电站的升出力和降出力计划申请，并自动处理升出力和降出力申请。
		4. The control method applied to the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the control center station of the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system in the step 1 receives the control command for the power grid , realize wind power and optical power prediction, monitor the status of the entire wind-solar-storage combined power generation system, formulate and issue power generation plans for wind farms, photovoltaic power stations, and energy storage power stations, and receive applications for raising and lowering output plans for wind farms and photovoltaic power stations. And automatically handle the application of lifting output and lowering output.

5. 如权利要求3所述的一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤二中的风电场控制子站主要实现风场风速、气压、风向气象数据的收集，并实时采集风场内各风机的电压、电流、有功功率、无功功率、频率、桨距角、风轮转速以及发电机转速信息；计算当前和未来一段时间的风电场升出力和降出力潜力，制定风电场升出力和降出力计划；向风光储联合发电系统控制中心站提交升出力和降出力申请，根据风光储联合发电系统控制中心站批准的升出力和降出力申请制定每台风机的出力调整计划，并将风机的出力调整计划下发给每台风机。
		5. The control method applied in the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the wind farm control sub-station in the step 2 mainly realizes wind speed, air pressure, The collection of wind direction and meteorological data, and real-time collection of voltage, current, active power, reactive power, frequency, pitch angle, wind rotor speed and generator speed information of each fan in the wind field; calculation of the current and future wind farm Raise and drop potential, formulate wind farm raise and drop plans; submit applications for lift and drop to the control center station of the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system, according to the lift-off and drop approved by the wind-storage combined power generation system control center station Apply to formulate the output adjustment plan of each fan, and issue the output adjustment plan of the fan to each fan.

6. 如权利要求3所述的一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤二中的光伏发电控制子站主要实现环境温度、辐照度和气象条件的收集，并实时采集光伏阵列电压、电流、有功功率、无功功率和逆变器控制角度信息；计算当前和未来一段时间的光伏阵列的升出力和降出力潜力，制定光伏电站的升出力和降出力计划；向风光储联合发电系统控制中心站提交升出力和降出力申请，根据风光储联合发电系统控制中心站批准的升出力和降出力申请制定光伏阵列的出力调整计划，并将光伏阵列的出力调整计划下发给各光伏阵列。
		6. The control method applied in the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the photovoltaic power generation control sub-station in the step 2 mainly realizes ambient temperature, irradiance and meteorological conditions, and real-time collection of photovoltaic array voltage, current, active power, reactive power and inverter control angle information; calculate the current and future period of time the photovoltaic array's power output and power reduction potential, formulate the photovoltaic power station Raise and drop plan; submit the application for raising and lowering power to the control center station of the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system, and formulate the output adjustment plan of the photovoltaic array according to the application for raising and lowering the output approved by the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system control center station, and Issue the output adjustment plan of the photovoltaic array to each photovoltaic array.

7. 如权利要求3所述的一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤三中的储能控制子站主要是收集各电池组的电压、电流、荷电状态信息，接受风光储联合发电系统控制中心站的调度指令，调整其出力变化，制定各电池组的发电计划，协调电池组的充放电次数和充放电功率。
		7. The control method applied to the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the energy storage control sub-station in the step 3 mainly collects the voltage of each battery pack , current, and state of charge information, accept dispatching instructions from the control center station of the wind-solar-storage combined power generation system, adjust its output changes, formulate power generation plans for each battery pack, and coordinate the charging and discharging times and charging and discharging power of the battery packs.

8. 如权利要求3所述的一一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤四中的风机控制单元根据风机上的风速仪测量当前的风速、风向信息，测量风机本身的电压、电流、有功功率、无功功率、频率、桨距角、风轮转速和发电机转速信息，并将测得的数据上传到风电场控制子站，同时接收风电场控制子站的出力调整计划，调整风机自身的出力大小。
		8. The control method applied to the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the wind turbine control unit in step 4 measures the current Wind speed and wind direction information, measure the voltage, current, active power, reactive power, frequency, pitch angle, wind rotor speed and generator speed information of the wind turbine itself, and upload the measured data to the wind farm control substation, at the same time Receive the output adjustment plan of the wind farm control substation, and adjust the output of the wind turbine itself.

9. 如权利要求3所述的一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤四中的光伏阵列控制单元主要实现测量其所在处的温度、辐照度信息，测量光伏阵列的电压、电流、有功功率、无功功率以及变流器控制角信息，同时将这些数据上传给光伏发电控制子站，并接收光伏发电控制子站的出力调整计划，调整光伏阵列的出力大小。
		9. The control method applied to the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the photovoltaic array control unit in the step 4 mainly realizes the measurement of the temperature where it is located, Irradiance information, measure the voltage, current, active power, reactive power and converter control angle information of the photovoltaic array, and upload these data to the photovoltaic power generation control sub-station, and receive the output adjustment plan of the photovoltaic power generation control sub-station , to adjust the output of the photovoltaic array.

10. 如权利要求3所述的一种风光储联合发电系统的有功优化控制系统所应用的控制方法，其特征是，所述步骤六中的储能电池控制单元主要实现测量电池组当前的充放电状态、充放电电压和电流、当前的充放电功率、荷电状态信息，将这些数据上传给储能控制子站，接收储能控制子站的出力调整计划，调整电池组的出力大小。
		10. The control method applied to the active power optimization control system of a wind-solar-storage combined power generation system as claimed in claim 3, wherein the energy storage battery control unit in the step 6 mainly realizes the measurement of the current charge of the battery pack. Discharge status, charge and discharge voltage and current, current charge and discharge power, and state of charge information, upload these data to the energy storage control substation, receive the output adjustment plan of the energy storage control substation, and adjust the output of the battery pack.
